siteDescription: Advanced dental care with a personal touch

testimonials.name: Rahul Sharma
testimonials.comment: The team at Dentux is exceptional! They made my dental visit comfortable and stress-free.

testimonials.name: Priya Patel
testimonials.comment: State-of-the-art facility with caring staff. Best dental experience I've had!

testimonials.name: Amit Kumar
testimonials.comment: Professional, punctual, and painless procedures. Highly recommend Dentux!

about.title: Meet Our Doctor

clinicOverview.description: Experience dental care in our state-of-the-art facility equipped with the latest technology for your comfort and the best possible treatment outcomes.

values.title: Patient-Centric Care

team.name: Dr. Arti S Bangare
team.bio: Dr. Arti has over 15 years of experience in cosmetic dentistry and is committed to providing the highest quality dental care.

bookAppointment.title: Book Your Appointment
bookAppointment.description: Schedule your visit with our dental experts. We'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
